text.section: An applicant who otherwise qualifies for a license is entitled to be examined as provided in this section.

The Board shall give examinations at least twice a year, at the times and places that the Board determines, to applicants for:
An occupational therapist license; and
An occupational therapy assistant license.
The Board shall notify each qualified applicant of the time and place of examination.

section.section: The Board shall determine the subjects, scope, form, and standards for acceptable performance for examinations given under this subtitle.

text.section: In accordance with the rules and regulations of the Board, an applicant may obtain the applicant's score and review the applicant's examination papers.
